title: Yacout 1934 (Comedy, Drama film) directed by Naguib El-Rihani, Willy Rozier

sources.title: Yacout 1934 (Comedy, Drama film) directed by Naguib El-Rihani, Willy Rozier
sources.description:
The Egyptian adaptation of a well-known play by French writer Pagnol depicts the story of a timid and naive schoolteacher who falls victim to exploitation. A wealthy aristocrat manipulates him into a money-making scheme, and the teacher appears to embrace the allure of his newfound corruption.

Original title: Yacout (1934)


Colorized version: https://youtu.be/fRBSQDofYr0

Directors: Nagib El-Rihani, Willy Rozier
Writers: Nagib El-Rihani, Badi Khayri, Marcel Pagnol
Stars: Nagib El-Rihani, Aim√©e Provence, Badi Khayri
Genres: Literary, Comedy, Drama
Languages: Arabic - French
